metadata.name: Ideas Machine by Hasie & The Robots X AMS Genesis
metadata.description:
AMS, www.allmountainstyle.com is a cycling brand producing innovative accessories for passionate riders.

Hasie & The Robots, www.hasiecustoms.com creates original and kick ass design, focusing on limited edition and individual creations.

We partnered for a collection of mountain bike Frame Guards and Mud Guards: www.allmountainstyle.com/ams-x-hasie and decided to do it again for our Genesis NFT. But let’s hear from Johan himself:

It was a pleasure to work with AMS again on this NFT.

The inspiration for this design came from family, the type of friendships and bonds we build with like minded brands and individuals. The AMS/ Hasie & The Robots family has grown from our first collaboration. This is the ideas machine that is driven by collaboration, with a Hasie flair.
